segments.text: I simply cannot believe what I'm witnessing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing ankle-deep in water, yet she continues to dry a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is absolutely unwavering; it's almost pathological.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoes?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she so lost in thought that she's blind to reality?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire floor is becoming a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, right behind her, are risking a serious fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely disconnected from her immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me genuinely frustrated to see such a lack of basic perception.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sheâ€™s meticulously polishing a plate while her kitchen floods!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential consequences of her unawareness are quite serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of this trance before disaster strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is frankly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down.
segments.speaker: PAR
